document.full_text: bp's russian partners in tnk-bp said on friday they expect "sensible proposals" from the british oil major to resolve the deadlock over bp's deal with rosneft.
document.title: tnk-bp russian partners seek bp offer over rosneft
lines_and_colors: bp's russian partners in tnk-bp said on friday they expect "sensible proposals" from the british oil major to resolve the deadlock over bp's deal with rosneft.
